title: Director, Paid Media (Healthcare)
content:
Director, Paid Media, Digital Health
Golin Health is looking for a Director, Paid Media to join our team!
Who We Are
Golin is a progressive public relations agency with expertise ranging from brand-building and cutting- edge digital content, to corporate reputation, healthcare advocacy and measurement. Golin aligns earned-first, data-driven creative with the customer journey, to deliver maximum impact for clients and reach a profoundly diverse global market. “Go All In” is the agency’s ethos and commitment to bravery over mediocrity.
We Go All In, in everything we do. We’re especially committed to Go All In for our people. We challenge our employees to be Courageously Happy, and have empowered them to do so by offering our LifeTime benefits program. Lifetime offers unlimited time off, enhanced family care, ridiculously good health and wellness benefits, and a monthly LifeTime stipend for the gym or hobbies. We really do want you to play as hard as you work!
Ready to go all in with us?
The Digital Health team is an energized group of strategists who meet at the corner of healthcare and multi-channel experiences. They promote performance-based strategies, content, targeting and measurement to help our pharma and med device clients meet and exceed their program objectives. The team manages global integrated campaigns, social activations, and digital consulting assignments – everything from influencer best practices to emerging technology and social platforms to consider.
The team is hiring a Director, Paid Media, to align paid media opportunities to audience-first channel preferences. The new Director will be face-to-face with our impressive clients and lead junior staff as part of the team bringing results-based solutions.
What You’ll Do:

Collaborate with Digital Health and Account leads to define and implement paid media strategies in accordance with brand goals and overall company business objectives
Define all elements of native, display, search, paid social, endemic and other media needs for the agency teams who will create
Analyze and interpret digital performance/analytics data on an ongoing basis; conversion measurement, identifies trends and actionable insights for continuous optimization
Manage performance across all back-ends and partners
Define and manage paid media tests – e.g. ad copy, dayparting, and landing pages
Establish relevant KPIs for the various channels, campaigns and tests
Manage assigned budget
Craft monthly, quarterly, and annual digital marketing reports for internal stakeholders
Create ad hoc/special request reports on an as needed basis
Drive and oversee campaign development and execution, including partnering with others for paid media and analytics
Play a key role in the annual planning process, representing Golin Health as a results and strategy-oriented client partner
Foster and maintain productive and influential client relationships
Cultivate a culture of support, growth and partnership among team and peers

What You Have:

Bachelor’s degree in marketing, communications or related field with 8+ years of experience driving and executing paid digital / social media / marketing campaigns
Excellent verbal, written, presentation and problem-solving skills
Strong digital marketing lead generation and consumer engagement expertise, including substantial experience with search engine marketing, social media marketing, display advertising, retargeting/remarketing, and other paid channels
Expert level knowledge of Google Ads
Tagging and pixel experience, work in omnichannel trigger-based systems a plus
Knowledge of analytics tools including hands-on experience with Google Analytics, WordPress Analytics, and ability to create effective data visualizations and reports
Data-centric approach to recommendations
Skilled in self-project management; highly organized and detail-oriented
A strong understanding of PESO modeling and experience integrating campaign strategies and tactics across all content types


Advanced knowledge of the regulatory landscape and understand its implications toward the healthcare industry’s use of media
Confidence when presenting
A solutions-oriented, self-starter, you don’t wait to be told what to do next, you’ve already started the process/downloaded the app/started the free software subscription

Salary Range: $100,000-180,000
Golin has included the base salary range or hourly rate for this role. Actual compensation offered within the range will depend upon, among other factors: a candidate’s skills, qualifications, and experience; actual ranges for current or former employees in the role; and market considerations.
Golin is proud to be an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, citizenship, disability or protected veteran status.
We make our careers website accessible to any and all users. If you need an accommodation to participate in the application process, please contact us at JobAppAccommodation@ipgdxtra.com. This email address is not for general employment inquiries or vendors; rather it is strictly for applicants who require special assistance accessing our employment website. Due to volume, messages sent to this email address that are not related to an accommodation cannot be answered.
